790210.name: Neon Knight: Vengeance From The Grave
790210.description:
ğŸŒ‘ Welcome to the dark world of the Neon Knight

Neon Knight is a 2D action side-scroller for Windows PC. Step into the epic tale of a supernatural warrior, resurrected to wander through a dystopian kingdom torn apart by fear and oppression. His mission: to end the reign of terror and uncover the fate of his lost family.

With its fast-paced combat, haunting atmosphere, and a story full of twists, Neon Knight blends the spirit of classic 2D games with modern action mechanics and cinematic storytelling.

FEATURES:

*Intense, fast-paced combat that keeps you on edge

*A narrative full of reversals and emotional stakes

*Atmospheric locations and memorable characters to discover

*Stylized monochrome visuals that define its unique dark aesthetic

*Immersive single-player journey through a dystopian world

*Survive Mode for those who crave endless challenge
